root.name: A Virus Named Tom
root.description: OverviewA Virus Named TOM is an action/puzzle game developed and published by Misfits Attic for the PC platform (with more platforms planned). The game is the debut title for studio Misfits Attic, lead by husband and wife team Tim and Holly Keenan, along with Sean Chang.A Virus Named TOM is a top-down puzzle based similar to the classic game Pipe Dream mixed with grid based movement. The playable character is named TOM, a virus created by Dr. X. After being fired Dr. X creates TOM to seek revenge.The player must route TOM through each of the 50 levels to infect the area and move on. The game supports cooperative mode adding an additional 50 levels to the game.PC System RequirementsOS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GhzMemory: 512 MBVideo Card: 256 Mb, Shader Model 2.0, c support for DirectX 9.0cSound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0Hard disk: 350 MB
